ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Gordon, the + case was wrongly added by myself due to an error interpreting the RFC1738. I only took a quick look at the BNF and it seems like I confused

Hi Gordon,

the '+' case was wrongly added by myself due to an error interp=
reting
the RFC1738. I only took a quick look at the BNF and it seems like I=

confused the scheme with the domainlabel.

Regards
  Olaf Freyer
